pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, August 30, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Kitchener, Ontario

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion on housing affordability. Minister of Housing and Diversity and Inclusion Ahmed Hussen will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement on housing. A media availability will follow. Minister of Housing and Diversity and Inclusion Ahmed Hussen will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:15 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

Toronto, Ontario

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Ontario, Doug Ford.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting
